DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : This study determine effectiveness use desensitivity gel prior office bleaching risk intensity tooth sensitivity cause in-office bleaching use 35 % hydrogen peroxide . Materials Methods : Fifty patient select triple-blind , randomize , cross-over , placebo-controlled clinical trial . 10 minute prior bleach procedure , patient receive potassium oxalate 5 % desensitivity gel placebo application vestibular surface . The whiten treatment 35 % hydrogen peroxide carry two session 7-day interval . Tooth sensitivity assess , 24 hour procedure use analog visual verbal scale . Color alteration assess bleach guide scale Vita Easy shade spectrophotometer 7 day session . Relative risk sensitivity calculate adjusted session ; comparison overall risk perform McNemar 's test . Data sensitivity level scale color shade subject Friedman , Wilcoxon Mann-Whitney test , respectively ( α = 0.05 )
DOC.detailed_description: Methods & Materials : This clinical trial approve Scientific Review Committee Committee Protection Human Subjects local University ( CAAE 60259916.0.0000.5546 ) . Trial design : This study randomize , triple-blinded , placebo-controlled clinical trial , split mouth study design . The patient include submit two in-office bleaching session receive potassium oxalate 5 % desensitivity placebo gel application vestibular surface , 10 minute . A delay 1 week session establish . The study conduct clinic School Dentistry local university February 2017 June 2018 . Participants : Patients include clinical trial least 18 year old good oral health . Patients six upper anterior teeth caries , restoration , severe discoloration ( e.g. , stain cause tetracycline ) , enamel hypoplasia , gingival recession , dentin exposure , pulpitis , endodontics exclude . Participants submit previous bleaching procedure , present prior tooth sensitivity , know allergy component medication use study , pregnant breastfeeding also exclude . Only patient present six upper anterior teeth shade mismatch 2.5 M2 ( Vita Bleachguide 3D-Master scale , Vita-Zahnfabrik , Bad Sackingen , Germany ) darker include . Sample Size Calculation : The sample calculation base primary binary outcome ( sensitivity risk 24 hour procedure ) superiority trial . Power test set 80 % , consider type I error 0.05 ; risk tooth sensitivity 63 % ( potassium nitrate ) 35 % ( potassium oxalate ) , reduction around 55 % treatment expect . The calculation result fifty patient . Randomization : A randomized list computer-generated person involve intervention evaluation . The participant define block randomization process , sequence treatment ( placebo etodolac ) randomly set block use computer-generated table ( www.sealedenvelope.com ) . The sequence insert sealed envelope number 1 50 open operator moment intervention . The patient number accord sequence enrollment . Neither participant operator know group allocation determine blind protocol . Baseline evaluation : Prior bleaching procedure , teeth clean use rubber cup associate pumice water . The shade six upper anterior teeth assess baseline use bleach guide scale CIE L*a*b* measurement , ΔE calculate follow equation : ∆E= [ ( ∆L ) 2 + ( ∆a ) 2 + ( ∆b ) 2 ] 1/2 , ∆L = L1 - L0 ; ∆a = a1 - a0 ; e ∆b = b1 - b0 . Intervention : Prior bleaching session , patient receive potassium nitrate 2 % ( active comparator ) one half ( anterior superior teeth ) potassium oxalate 5 % desensitivity gel half ( anterior superior teeth ) application vestibular surface , 10 minute . Neither operator responsible intervention evaluation patient know content treatment do . A light-cured resin dam apply ( Top Dam , FGM , Joinville , SC , Brazil ) gingival tissue correspond teeth bleach . A 35 % hydrogen peroxide base bleaching agent ( Whiteness HP MAxx Intermixx , FGM , Joinville , SC , Brazil ) mix apply vestibular surface teeth , remain 40 minute . After time , bleach agent remove . A second session carry 1 week follow procedure . Evaluations : The tooth sensitivity report patient assess use visual analog scale ( VAS ) verbal rating scale ( VRS ) . The VAS consist scale 10 cm length range green ( absence pain ) red ( unsupportable pain ) . The patient set level sensitivity point color correspond level , distance point green border record . For VRS , patient report level sensitivity base score : 0 = none , 1 = light , 2 = moderate , 3 = considerable 4 = severe . The tooth sensitivity assess bleaching , immediately bleach agent removal 24 hour . For last assessment , VRS use . Tooth sensitivity measure : baseline , 40 minute bleach procedure , bleach procedure 24 hour . One week session tooth color evaluate use procedure describe previously . Statistical Analysis : The demographic data patient analyzed determine age , gender , anxiety level allocation sequence . Comparisons allocation sequence perform Mann-Whitney test ( age ) Fisher 's exact ( gender ) chi-square ( anxiety level ) test . Based presence tooth sensitivity ( score different 0 VRS ) , absolute risk , odds ratio relative risk calculate regard treatment moment evaluation/session bleaching , well confidence interval ( 95 % ) . For moment , difference presence/absence ratio analyze Fisher 's exact test . For overall risk relate treatment , odds ratio adjust independent variable `` session bleaching '' use Mantel-Haenszel statistic . The homogeneity odds ratio analyze Breslow-Day Tarone 's test . Following , odds ratio estimate converted relative risk overall presence/absence ratio analyze McNemar 's test , consider study design ( cross-over ) . For VRS , data score observe time evaluation/session bleach submit Mann-Whitney rank sum test . Despite measurement tooth sensitivity use VAS give continuous outcome , data assess scale show normal distribution ( Shapiro-Wilk 's test ) . Thus , data VAS also analyze Mann-Whitney rank sum test , one test per time evaluation carry . For color evaluation , comparison sequence treatment perform use Mann-Whitney rank sum test . The Friedman test follow Dunn 's post hoc test use analyze difference moment evaluation sequence treatment . All statistical analysis perform adjust initial significance level ( α = 0.05 ) Bonferroni correction .
DOC.criteria: Patients include clinical trial least 18 year old good oral health ; Patients present six upper anterior teeth shade mismatch 2.5 M2 ( Vita Bleachguide 3DMaster scale , VitaZahnfabrik , Bad Sackingen , Germany ) darker include . Patients six upper anterior teeth caries ; Restorations anterior teeth ' Patients tooth severe discoloration ( e.g. , stain cause tetracycline ) ; Presence enamel hypoplasia ; Presence gingival recession dentin exposure ; Presence tooth pulpitis endodontics ; Participants submit previous bleaching procedure ; Patients prior tooth sensitivity ; Patients know allergy component medication use study ; Pregnant breastfeeding also also exclude .
